answers.answer: If baby is measuring very large, they'll schedule an induction before your due date. Induction will definitely be the first route unless there's another reason that they have to do a sec.

My sisternin law just had a c-section for her baby due to being too big to deliever vaginally. They didn't even talk induction, told her at like 35 weeks she'd be scheduled for a c-section. She's about the same height, and weighted 98 pre-pregnancy. Her baby was 7lbs 12ozs 20 1/2 inches.Depends on the doctor. But, I wouldn't count on induction.

My sisternin law just had a c-section for her baby due to being too big to deliever vaginally. They didn't even talk induction, told her at like 35 weeks she'd be scheduled for a c-section. She's about the same height, and weighted 98 pre-pregnancy. Her baby was 7lbs 12ozs 20 1/2 inches.Depends on the doctor. But, I wouldn't count on induction.

I was induced with my 2nd baby at 36 weeks for medical reasons. My son was 8 lbs! Im 4"11 also and pre preg weight is 110 lbs on average. I didnt tear at all. Dont pysche yourself out because your small. You can do it.
Thanks destynee & omg I rather get induced if anything but so far my baby about 3 lbs n I will b 31 weeks tomorrow idk if that's bad or good

They made me get a second anatomy scan to because they said my belly was measuring 2 weeks to small and that it could mean my baby wasn't growing but when i got the scan they said that i had nothing to worry about my baby was right on time with size. Peoples bellies just grow differently is all. So I would just wait til after the appt, hope all goes great! :)

3lb is pretty normal around that time.. when i had my 30 weeks scan my son was 3lb 10oz which was a little chunkier than the average.. so baby girl is right on schedule... if she was under 3lb it might have been a concern.

question: so tomorrow I have a ultrasound bc my baby is measuring two weeks ahead btw I'm 30 weeks 4 days today I'm scare they'll say she's too big for me bc they always tell me how little I am not belly wise but height wise I'm 4"11 I'm scare to be told I need a c section I REALLYYY don't want one !! I think she's big bc I have gestational diabetes can they just induce me instead of a c section if she's too big ?
title: Nervous !!
